title: Training Ground
tagline: Sandbox for coding drills and experimental learning
description: A brutalist sandbox environment designed for continuous learning iterations, coding drills, and experimental feature development. This repository serves as a training ground where challenges are met with execution-driven learning.

title: MapApp
tagline: Educational mapping app for Vue 3 and Pinia practice
description: A personal learning project to master Vue 3 Composition API, Pinia state management, and modern web development by building a functional interactive map application with real-time search, route calculation, and geolocation features.

title: Camino de Santiago Interactive Map
tagline: Interactive photo map documenting a personal pilgrimage journey
description: A technical showcase mapping 64 photographic points along the Camino de Santiago from Sarria to Palas de Rei, featuring GPS coordinates, AI-generated reflections, and a responsive interface for immersive exploration.

title: SaMenufit
tagline: Intelligent meal planning and nutrition assistant
description: A Vue-based web application that simplifies daily menu management by following Doctor Mike Diamonds' recipes, helping users create shopping lists and track calories. Built as a practice project to apply Vue skills with a screaming architecture and domain-driven design principles.

title: Category Editor
tagline: Visual e-commerce category editor with drag-and-drop
description: A React-based visual editor for organizing e-commerce products into rows with customizable alignment templates, featuring advanced drag-and-drop functionality and responsive design.

title: Movies App
tagline: Modern movie discovery app built with React Native and Expo
description: A sleek, feature-rich mobile application for discovering and exploring movies, featuring real-time data, multilingual support, and user authentication. Built as part of a JM Mastery course, it combines modern UI design with robust backend integration for a seamless movie browsing experience.

title: PrepWise
description: A Next.js application that lets users create custom job interviews, practice with a voice AI assistant via Vapi, and receive detailed feedback powered by Google Gemini to improve interview skills.

title: Awwwards Web Style
description: A web application built with React and GSAP to master high-performance animations in a modern frontend stack, following JS Mastery's course.

title: Xora App
description: A web application built with React and Vite, serving as a review of Tailwind and React for creating static pages, following the JS Mastery course.

title: Movies React App
tagline: React-powered movie explorer with TMDB API
description: A sleek movie discovery app built with React and Vite, featuring real-time search, detailed movie info, multi-language support, and trending films—all wrapped in a responsive Tailwind CSS interface.

title: Fast Pizza
tagline: Real-time pizza ordering app built with React
description: A React-based application for managing pizza orders quickly and efficiently, featuring dynamic components and state management for an interactive and smooth user experience.

title: Bankist
tagline: Modern banking UI with smooth animations and lazy loading
description: A sleek, interactive banking interface featuring smooth scrolling, modal forms, tabbed components, and performance-optimized lazy image loading, built as a DOM manipulation exercise.

title: Curriculum Minimalista
tagline: CV web imprimible basado en JSON Resume
description: Un portafolio minimalista y funcional para crear currículums web listos para imprimir, utilizando el esquema JSON Resume. Diseñado con Astro para un rendimiento óptimo y una experiencia de desarrollo moderna.

title: Wild Oasis
tagline: Interactive React app for cabin management
description: A dynamic React application built as part of a course, focusing on component creation and state management for a modern cabin booking system.

title: Natours
tagline: API para gestionar tours y reservas
description: Proyecto backend desarrollado con Node.js como parte de un curso avanzado. Incluye autenticación, autorización, manejo de datos y API RESTful. Basado en las mejores prácticas de desarrollo backend con Node.js, Express, y MongoDB.

title: The Tomorrow List
description: A minimalist task management tool built with Create React App, focusing on clean UI and efficient development workflows for organizing daily priorities.

title: DLNL
description: A React-based tool leveraging AI to summarize and translate articles, featuring robust state management with Redux and a sleek TailwindCSS design.
